How to save? well the game shows you how - just hit Esc, select "SAVE" - then in the window in the upper corner hit SAVE in that and enter in the name of the save state you want it to be saved as - that's all. Works the same way with loading the saved states.

Fullscreen mode does not work for me either, the game is all glitched-up and lagging. I've tried it on my MBP; i5 2,3 ghz, Intel HD Graphics 3000 (384 mb). Is there anything that can be done, or is my graphic card to inferior or something?
Problem solved! Open up the installed package, and enter the wrapper; Advanced > Tools > Winetricks. Run "ddr = gdi", located under Settings. VOILA!
